SliderTexts.slider1header: Legal Solutions with Expertise and Trust
SliderTexts.slider1paragh: Based in Istanbul, YUKSEL Law offers comprehensive legal consultancy and representation services to both individual and corporate clients. We provide professional solutions across all areas.
SliderTexts.slider2paragh: YUKSEL Law is committed to defending the rights of its clients with the highest standards, specializing in areas such as commercial law, labor law, and family law. We manage your legal processes transparently.
SliderTexts.slider3header: The Assurance of Law in Istanbul
SliderTexts.slider3paragh: YUKSEL Law offers a wide range of services in both national and international legal matters, providing strategic and effective solutions to its clients.

HomePractices.title: Practices
HomePractices.P1: We provide services with individual and corporate solutions.

HomePracticesParagraph.HomePracticesParagraph1: Tailored commercial solutions and legal support for businesses.
HomePracticesParagraph.HomePracticesParagraph3: Fast and effective debt collection solutions.

HomePublications.H11: What's on the Agenda of Justice?
HomePublications.P1: New laws, rulings, and changes in the legal field.
HomePublications.Text: Through our blog posts, you can gain insights into important topics in the industry and stay updated on the latest developments in the field of law.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: What types of cases does the law firm handle?
items.answer: Our law firm provides services in many areas such as Commercial Law, Labor and Employment Law, Intellectual Property, Family and Marriage Law, Real Estate Law, and Health Law.

items.question: Do you charge for consultations?
items.answer: The first consultation is free. We discuss your case and determine how we can assist you.

items.question: How long will this process take?
items.answer: The duration of the process depends on the complexity of the case. We aim to achieve the most efficient solution.

items.question: Can I file a lawsuit on behalf of a deceased family member?
items.answer: Yes, you can file a lawsuit on behalf of a deceased family member. Please contact us for more information.

items.question: What is the experience of your lawyers?
items.answer: Our lawyers have more than 20 years of experience in various areas of law.

items.question: Can I choose my lawyer?
items.answer: Yes, you can choose your lawyer based on their areas of expertise and your specific needs.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We provide a wide range of legal services, including consultancy, case follow-up, and mediation.

items.question: Do you offer online consultancy services?
items.answer: Yes, we offer online consultancy services for your convenience.

items.question: What are your service fees?
items.answer: Our fees vary depending on the complexity of the case. Please contact us for a detailed quote.

items.question: Do you offer payment plans?
items.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans considering your financial situation.

faq.paragraph: You can find the answers to common questions about our legal services in this section.
